voicesplitting.parsing

Class EventParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • voicesplitting.parsing.EventParser

  • public class EventParser
extends java.lang.Object
    An EventParser handles the interfacing between this program and MIDI files. It can read in MIDI events from a file with run(), play the audio of the currently loaded data with playAudio().

    One EventParser is required per song you wish to parse.

    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 23 October, 2014

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventParser

        public EventParser(java.io.File midiFile,
           NoteEventParser noteEventParser,
           TimeTracker timeTracker,
           boolean useChannel)
            throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Creates a new Midi EventParser
        Parameters:
        midiFile - The MIDI file we will parse.
        noteEventParser - The NoteEventParser to pass events to when we run this parser.
        useChannel - True if we want to use the input data's channel as gold standard voices. False to use track instead.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurred when reading the given file.
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If the given file was is not in a valid MIDI format.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parses the events from the loaded MIDI file through to the NoteTracker.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If a note off event doesn't match any previously seen note on.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If this is running on a GUI and gets cancelled.

      • playAudio

        public void playAudio()
               throws javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException,
                      javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Plays the audio of the current song.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

        A List of the gold standard voices from this song.
